column2: chart1<-ggplot(yavg, aes(x=Year, y=AVgTemp))+geom_line(colour="coral", size=0.6)+theme(panel.grid = element_line(colour = "white"))+theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"), axis.text = element_text(colour="gray59"))+geom_smooth()+theme(panel.background=element_rect(fill= "white"), plot.background = element_rect(fill="white"))+labs(y="Annual Average Temperature (Â°C)")+theme(axis.title.y = element_text(color="coral", face="bold"))
